Notes:

This recording was made using a Sony F-1 digital tape recorder with a Sony Beta-Hi-Fi Video Deck. The stereo signal from the live mixing desk was fed to the digital recorder and two stereo ambience mics were simultaneously recorded onto the Beta Hi-Fi section of the recorder.
The resulting recording captures the excitement of a live performance as well as the presence and ambience of being part of the audience.


"Luka" is a song recorded by Suzanne Vega and released as a single in 1987. It remains her highest-charting hit in the United States, reaching number 3 on the Billboard Hot 100. Vega also recorded a Spanish-language version of the song, featured on the single.
This song was one of the earliest to deal with child abuse and domestic violence. One critic said, "the 'happy' music is a metaphorical denial, making this seem beautiful and serene while discussing something terrible and devastating. It is a wonderful use of tune as a metaphor for how many abuse victims also deny their abuse, and is a profound classic". wikipedia
